title: W-7 Net Worth Calculation
description: Net Worth is the hero metric: Total Assets - Total Liabilities. Calculation engine, dashboard display with breakdown cards, asset allocation, historical charts, and top performer highlights.

userStories.title: Create net worth calculation service
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a service to calculate total net worth from all holdings.
acceptanceCriteria: Tradeable assets: sum of (quantity x current price) for stocks, ETFs, crypto
Snapshot assets: sum of latest snapshot balances for super, cash
Debt: sum of latest snapshot balances for debt holdings
Net Worth = Total Assets - Total Debt
Returns: { netWorth, totalAssets, totalDebt, breakdown, calculatedAt }

userStories.title: Create asset breakdown calculation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to calculate asset values grouped by type.
acceptanceCriteria: Groups by type: stocks, etfs, crypto, super, cash, debt
Each group: { type, totalValue, count, percentage, holdings[] }
Holdings include: name, value, percentage of group

userStories.title: Create carry-forward logic for missing data
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to handle missing prices/snapshots gracefully.
acceptanceCriteria: For tradeable: use cached price even if stale, flag as stale
For snapshots: use most recent snapshot, flag if older than 2 months
Track stale holdings: { holdingId, name, type, lastUpdated, reason }
NetWorthResult includes: { staleHoldings: StaleHolding[], hasStaleData: boolean }

userStories.title: Create historical net worth calculation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to calculate net worth at past points in time.
acceptanceCriteria: Uses snapshots for that month (carry-forward if missing)
For tradeable: uses quantity at month-end x price at month-end (if available) or current price
Returns last N months of data points

userStories.title: Create top performers calculation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to identify top gainers and losers.
acceptanceCriteria: Function `getTopPerformers(userId, limit): Promise<{ gainers: Performer[], losers: Performer[] }>`
Performer: { holdingId, name, symbol, gainLoss, gainLossPercent, type }
Based on unrealized gain/loss for tradeable holdings
Returns top N gainers and top N losers

userStories.title: Create net worth API endpoint
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API endpoint to get current net worth.
acceptanceCriteria: Response: { netWorth, totalAssets, totalDebt, breakdown, staleHoldings, calculatedAt }

userStories.title: Create net worth history API endpoint
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API endpoint to get historical net worth.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns array of monthly data points

userStories.title: Create top performers API endpoint
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API endpoint to get top performers.

userStories.title: Dashboard hero net worth card
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see my net worth prominently on the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Large hero card at top of dashboard
Shows change from last month: +$12,345 (+2.5%) in green or red
Stale data warning icon if hasStaleData is true

userStories.title: Dashboard total assets and debt cards
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see total assets and debt alongside net worth.
acceptanceCriteria: Two smaller cards: 'Total Assets' and 'Total Debt'
Each shows change from last month

userStories.title: Dashboard asset allocation cards
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see my asset allocation by type.
acceptanceCriteria: Each type: icon, name, value, percentage of total
Types: Stocks, ETFs, Crypto, Super, Cash (Debt shown separately)

userStories.title: Dashboard net worth history chart
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see how my net worth has changed over time.
acceptanceCriteria: Line chart showing net worth over last 12 months
Hover shows exact value for that month

userStories.title: Dashboard top performers section
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see my best and worst performing holdings.
acceptanceCriteria: Section showing 'Top Gainers' and 'Top Losers' (5 each)
Each shows: name/symbol, gain/loss amount, percentage
Gainers in green, losers in red
Empty state if no tradeable holdings

userStories.title: Stale data indicator and breakdown
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to know which holdings have stale data affecting my net worth.
acceptanceCriteria: Warning banner on dashboard if hasStaleData is true
Expandable to show list of stale holdings
Each shows: name, type, last updated, reason
Link to holding or action to refresh

userStories.title: Dashboard refresh functionality
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to refresh all data to get the latest net worth.
acceptanceCriteria: Refreshes: prices, then recalculates net worth
Updates all cards and charts on completion

userStories.title: Update dashboard home page
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to replace placeholder dashboard with real content.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove placeholder 'Net worth tracking coming soon' text
Integrate all dashboard components: hero card, summary cards, allocation, chart, performers
Responsive layout: cards stack on mobile

userStories.title: Install Recharts dependency
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Recharts library for data visualization.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify package is added to package.json
